des: "This recipe is delicious, quick and easy. It goes great with green beans, and is the perfect way to use left over mashed potatoes. Serve with green beans for a quick supper or eggs and toast for a hearty breakfast."
ins: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Fry onion in oil until translucent. Transfer to a medium bowl, and mix with mashed potatoes and corned beef. Season with salt and pepper. Form into 8 patties. Fry patties in the skillet over medium-high heat until golden brown on both sides.
